column3: Closing, this is taking too long for a one-line change like this. If you intend to work on this again let me know and I'll reopen.
The indentation needs to match the other steps below for this to be formatted correctly :)
@WhiteSymmetry If you need some help in understanding what needs to be done here, please feel free to ask.  (I agree with @MeshCollider's review and request.)

Take a look at the rendered output: https://github.com/WhiteSymmetry/bitcoin/blob/527a0b805fb3d58ce57f86d795d2de677d1677ac/doc/build-windows.md#building-for-64-bit-windows  to see how this goes wrong.
during review you can also quick "view" button in code changes section to see the formatting
